definition: abbr. for 揚州|扬州[Yang2 zhou1]/surname Yang
to raise/to hoist/the action of tossing or winnowing/scattering (in the wind)/to flutter/to propagate
abbr. for 揚州|扬州[Yang2 zhou1]/surname Yang
to raise/to hoist/the action of tossing or winnowing/scattering (in the wind)/to flutter/to propagate

sentences.english: Recently, Canton real estate sector towards increasing prices for this year seething .
sentences.chinese: 最近，廣東地產界對今年房價走向日益沸沸揚揚。

sentences.english: That Peter will marry Alice, which has not been announced yet, has spread around.
sentences.chinese: 彼特要娶愛麗斯這件事還沒發佈，卻已傳得沸沸揚揚。

definition: lit. badly burned about the head (from trying to put out a fire) (idiom)/fig. hard-pressed/under pressure (from a heavy workload, creditors etc)
to bombard/to bomb/(fig.) to criticize/to roast
to rain curses (on sb)/to let sb have it/to bawl sb out
more and more emerge/innumerable succession/breeding like flies (idiom)
widely spread/widely rumored/stories abound/(sb's exploits are) widely circulated
